data.title: VPL - If you like Charles Bukowski - Vancouver Public Library
data.meta_description:
VPL - If you like Charles Bukowski by vpl_booksjustforyou21 - a staff-created list : If you like Charles Bukowski and gritty, disturbing writing, you might like...
 If you'd like to see more, click on the author's name to find more titles by that author. These books were chosen by the VPL Reading Experts.
data.text:
Charles Bukowski trains his keen eye on the seamy side of life; gambling, alcoholism, raunchy sex, and the urban underbelly. Charles Bukowski trains his keen eye on the seamy side of life; gambling, alcoholism, raunchy sex, and the urban underbelly. Show less

Chuck Palahniuk writes novels that are bleak, creepy and darkly humorous; graphic brutality, sex, and profanity abound. Chuck Palahniuk writes novels that are bleak, creepy and darkly humorous; graphic brutality, sex, and profanity abound. Show less

Hubert Selby's writing is stream-of-consciousness, written in the rough, uneducated language of the streets of New York City. Hubert Selby's writing is stream-of-consciousness, written in the rough, uneducated language of the streets of New York City. Show less

All copies in use. Availability details Holds: 1 on 2 copies

Irvine Welsh writes gritty and provocative fiction of the grimy streets, junkies, and senseless crime of his native Scotland. Irvine Welsh writes gritty and provocative fiction of the grimy streets, junkies, and senseless crime of his native Scotland. Show less

Musician, poet, and novelist, Jim Carroll portrays the mean streets of New York City and the pursuit of drugs, pleasure, and art. Musician, poet, and novelist, Jim Carroll portrays the mean streets of New York City and the pursuit of drugs, pleasure, and art. Show less

William S. Burroughs, one of the founders of the Beat Movement, devoloped his own, experimental "cut-up" method of writing which he used to write about drugs, sex, and violence. William S. Burroughs, one of the founders of the Beat Movement, devoloped his own, experimental "cut-up" method of writing which he used to write about drugs, sex, and violence. Show less

Local author, Chris Walter is a punk rock historian and novelist. His novels portray the darker aspects of humanity such as drug addiction, prostitution, and homelessness. Local author, Chris Walter is a punk rock historian and novelist. His novels portray the darker aspects of humanity such as drug addiction, prostitution, and homelessness. Show less

T. Coraghessan Boyle covers topics from colonialism and sexuality to baseball and popular culture. His tone is serious and atmospheric, tinged with darkly humourous notes and with an occasional magical realism touch. T. Coraghessan Boyle covers topics from colonialism and sexuality to baseball and popular culture. His tone is serious and atmospheric, tinged with darkly humourous notes and with an occasional magical realism touch. Show less

Sigizmund Krzhizhanovskii, a dissident Soviet writer who was virtually unknown during his lifetime, provides an absurd, twisted, and fantastic look at the world. His weird and imaginative tales are bleak and full of dark, biting humour. Sigizmund Krzhizhanovskii, a dissident Soviet writer who was virtually unknown during his lifetime, provides an absurd, twisted, and fantastic look at the world. His weird and imaginative tales are bleak and full of dark, biting humour. Show less

All copies in use. Availability details
